para.text: The Office shall provide training in telecommunicator cardiopulmonary resuscitation ("t-CPR") to all Office call takers and dispatchers.
The training required pursuant to subsection (a) of this section shall:
Use protocols and scripts based on evidence-based and nationally recognized guidelines for t-CPR; and
Recognition protocols for out-of-hospital cardiac arrest;

For the purposes of this section, "telecommunicator cardiopulmonary resuscitation" and "t-CPR" mean the delivery of compression or ventilation instructions to callers who are reporting suspected cases of out-of-hospital cardiac arrest.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 3205d of Fiscal Year 2023 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2022 (D.C. Act 24-470, July 13, 2022, 69 DCR 008707).
